Package org.activebpel.rt.bpel.def.faults

Interface Summary
IAeCatch Provides interface for faultHandlers.
IAeFaultMatchingRule interface for the fault matching rules
IAeFaultMatchingStrategy Determines which fault handler is capable of catching a fault.
IAeMatch interface for the fault matching rules
 

Class Summary
AeBaseFaultMatchingStrategy Base impl of the fault matching strategy.
AeBaseFaultMatchingStrategy.AeFaultMatchingRule Base class for matching rules.
AeBaseFaultMatchingStrategy.AeFaultNameAndData Matches a fault w/ data to a catch with a matching fault name and data
AeBaseFaultMatchingStrategy.AeFaultNameOnly Matches a fault w/o data to a catch with a matching fault name
AeBaseFaultMatchingStrategy.AeVariableOnly Matches a fault with data to a catch w/o a name but with matching data
AeBPWSFaultMatchingStrategy Fault matching strategy for BPEL4WS 1.1
AeFaultMatchingStrategyFactory Strategy that implements the fault matching rules for the version of BPEL we're executing/validating
AeMatch Definition for bpel fault handler and fault data match.
AeWSBPELFaultMatchingStrategy Fault matching strategy for WS-BPEL 2.0
AeWSBPELFaultMatchingStrategy.AeFaultNameAndData_WSBPEL Matches if the fault name and data are exact matches.
AeWSBPELFaultMatchingStrategy.AeFaultNameAndData_WSBPEL_SG Matches if the fault has element data that is a member of a substituion group headed by the element in the catch varaible.
AeWSBPELFaultMatchingStrategy.AeFaultNameAndSingleElement Matches if the catch has the same name as the fault and the fault data is a single element message that matches the element variable for the catch.
AeWSBPELFaultMatchingStrategy.AeFaultNameAndSingleElement_SG Matches if the fault has message data that is a single part element.
AeWSBPELFaultMatchingStrategy.AeFaultNameOnlyIgnoreData Matches a catch by fault name to a fault with the same name and data.
AeWSBPELFaultMatchingStrategy.AeVariableOnly_WSBPEL Matches a catch with a message/element variable to a fault with identical data
AeWSBPELFaultMatchingStrategy.AeVariableOnly_WSBPEL_SG Matches if the fault has an element that is a memeber of a substituion group headed by the catch element.
AeWSBPELFaultMatchingStrategy.AeVariableOnlyAndSingleElement Matches a catch with an element variable and no name to a single element part message.
AeWSBPELFaultMatchingStrategy.AeVariableOnlyAndSingleElement_SG Matches a catch with an element variable and no name to a single element part message if the fault is in a substitution group of catch.
